contentrichtext.text: {{Use dmy dates|date=July 2013}} {{Infobox station | name = Darling | type = | style = Melbourne | image = | image_caption = Looking towards the station, and away from the city | address = | country = | coordinates = {{coord|37.86894|S|145.06288|E|format=dms|type:railwaystation_region:AU-VIC|display=inline,title}} | line = <!-- line information is detailed under "services" --> | other = | structure = | platform = 2 | depth = | levels = | tracks = 2 | parking = | bicycle = | baggage_check = | opened = | closed = | rebuilt = | electrified = | ADA = | code = DLG | owned = [[VicTrack]] | operator = | zone = | smartcardname = [[Myki]] zone | smartcardstatus = <span style="color:goldenrod;">1</span>+<span style="color:blue;">2</span> overlap | status = [[Premium Station]] | former = | passengers = | pass_year = | pass_percent = | pass_system = | mpassengers = | services = {{s-rail|title=Metro Trains}} {{s-line|system=Victoria|line=Glen Waverley|previous=Glen Iris|next=East Malvern }} | map_locator = [http://maps.google.com.au/maps?q=Malvern+East,+Victoria&hl=en&ll=-37.868722,145.062854&spn=0.004599,0.009645&sll=-37.859176,145.057994&sspn=0.0046,0.009645&vpsrc=6&hnear=Malvern+East+Victoria&t=m&z=17 Link] | Melway = [http://www.street-directory.com.au/sd3/map.php?x=145.06280984576313&y=-37.86888996071079&l=13&mt=4 Link] | web = [http://www.metlinkmelbourne.com.au/stop/view/19837 Link, includes timetables] }} '''Darling''' is a [[railway station]] in [[Melbourne]], [[Victoria (Australia)|Victoria]], Australia, located in the suburb of [[Malvern East, Victoria|Malvern East]], on the [[Glen Waverley railway line]]. Darling is classed as a [[Premium Station]] and is in [[Metcard]] Zone <span style="color:goldenrod;">1</span>+<span style="color:blue;">2</span> overlap. ==Station overview== ===Facilities=== Darling is located between Clynden Avenue and the [[Monash Freeway]], with station access from Clynden Avenue. The station consists of two [[side platform]]s; Platform 1 has a large brick building housing an enclosed waiting area, ticket facilities and [[toilets]], while platform 2 has a smaller brick building. A large [[Metcard]] ticket vending machine was located inside the waiting area, which is able to dispense most ticketing options available and also accept notes and coins, with additional coin-only Metcard ticket vending machines situated in the waiting area and at the entrance to platform 2. These have been replaced by [[Myki]] ticket vending machines are located inside the waiting area on platform 1, and at the entrance to platform 2. A footbridge, [[signal box]] and a [[crossover (rail)|crossover]] are all situated at the [[Flinders Street Station|Flinders Street]] end of the station. ===History=== Darling station opened on 24 March 1890, with [[railway electrification system|electrification]] reaching the station in 1922.<ref>[http://www.vicsig.net/index.php?page=infrastructure&name=Darling VICSIG Infrastructure â€“ Darling]</ref> The line though the station was originally built to link [[Burnley railway station|Burnley station]] to the [[Outer Circle railway line|Outer Circle line]] and on to [[Oakleigh railway station|Oakleigh station]]. The outer part of the line beyond Darling closed on 9 December 1895,<ref>{{cite book | author = David Beardsell and Bruce Herbert | title = The Outer Circle: A history of the Oakleigh to Fairfield Park Railway | publisher = Australian Railway Historical Society (Victorian Division) | year = 1979 | isbn = 0-85849-024-2 }}</ref> and was not extended to [[Glen Waverley railway station|Glen Waverley]] until 1930. Darling was upgraded to a Premium Station in 2008. {{Victorian closed stations|VICORMELB=Melbourne |Line1=[[Outer Circle railway line|Outer Circle connection]] |Previous1plain = towards Burnley |Next1=Waverley Road }} ===Platforms=== '''Platform 1:''' *[[Metro Trains Melbourne|Metro Trains]] services towards Flinders Street. '''Platform 2:''' *Metro Trains services towards Glen Waverley. ==References== {{reflist}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Darling Railway Station}} [[Category:Railway stations in Melbourne]] [[Category:Railway stations opened in 1890]] {{Melbourne-rail-stub}}
